version.description: The version of the saved form.

actions.description: Represents a set of action definitions.

errorProps.description: Properties of the component displaying the error.

modalType.description: Name of the type of component that displays the modal.

tooltipType.description: Name of the type of component that displays the tooltip.

errorType.description: Name of the type of component displaying the error.

form.description: Settings for components that display the form.

description: The scheme describes the JSON structure and the set of components used

PersistedFormVersion.description: The version of the saved form.

ActionValues.description: Represents a set of action definitions.

propertyNames.description: The type for the parameter name.

ActionParameters.description: Represents a set of action parameters.

value.description: The simple value of a component property.

fnSource.description: Source code of the function for calculating the value of a component property.

computeType.description: Type of the component's calculated property. If not specified - the value from value is used.

editorType.description: The component property editor type, only used in Designer mode.

ComponentProperty.description: The value of the component property.

Css.description: The type for the CSS property of a React component.

object.description: CSS styles defined in the general style settings.

string.description: CSS styles defined in the style code editor.

ComponentStyle.description: The type for the style property of a React component.

ActionData.description: Action Storage. Used for add a new action, store information about it.

propertyNames.description: The type for the parameter name.

Arguments.description: It will be transformed in arguments before passing in action.

ArgumentValue.description: The type of the argument value of the function.

body.description: The source code of the function for use in design mode.

autoValidate.description: Flag, if true then automatic validation of the value works, false otherwise.

validations.description: The array of validation rule settings.

key.description: The unique key of the validation rule. The key is unique within the value type.

validateWhen.description: The property that determines when validation needs to be performed.

HtmlAttribute.description: The arbitrary HTML attributes for the component.

LocalizationValue.description: The format in which localization is stored.

ComponentsLocalization.description: A record containing localizations grouped by component key.

TypedLocalization.description: A record containing localizations grouped by localization type.

ComponentPropsLocalization.description: A record containing localizations for the component properties.

name.description: the name of the language, for example 'English'.

description.description: the description of the language, for example 'American English'.

bidi.description: the type of text layout, for example, BiDi.LTR.

Language.description: The language to localize the form builder.

BiDi.description: The enumeration of bidirectional text layout types.

body.description: The source code of the Action.

allOf.description: A button component used to trigger actions or events

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

disableElevation.description: Removes the button shadow when set to true

loading.description: Displays a loading indicator and disables interaction

allOf.description: Groups related buttons together

orientation.description: Sets the layout direction of the buttons

allOf.description: Allows selecting one or more options

checked.description: If true, the component is checked

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

name.description: Name attribute used to group radio buttons

required.description: If true, the input element is required

error.description: If true, the component is displayed in an error state

allOf.description: A single radio button used within a radio group

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

allOf.description: Dropdown component for selecting options

required.description: If true, the input element is required

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

error.description: If true, the component is displayed in an error state

allOf.description: Toggle control for switching between two states

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

checked.description: If true, the component is checked

allOf.description: Input field for text and form data

type.description: HTML input type (text, password, email, etc.)

multiline.description: Renders a textarea instead of a single-line input

maxRows.description: Maximum number of visible rows for multiline input

required.description: If true, the input element is required

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

error.description: If true, the component is displayed in an error state

margin.description: Defines the margin applied to the component

allOf.description: Displays text with predefined typography styles

noWrap.description: If true, the text will not wrap, but instead will truncate with a text overflow ellipsis

gutterBottom.description: If true, the text will have a bottom margin

allOf.description: Displays contextual information on hover, focus, or touch

arrow.description: Displays an arrow pointing to the target element

disableFocusListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on focus

disableInteractive.description: Disables interaction with the tooltip content

disableHoverListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on hover

disableTouchListener.description: Prevents the tooltip from appearing on touch

followCursor.description: Makes the tooltip follow the cursor position

enterDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing the tooltip

leaveDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before hiding the tooltip

title.description: Text content displayed inside the tooltip

allOf.description: Displays a vertical list of items

disablePadding.description: If true, disables the default padding

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

allOf.description: Represents a single item inside a list

disableGutters.description: If true, disables the left and right padding

disablePadding.description: If true, disables the default padding

divider.description: Displays a divider below the list item

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

allOf.description: Indicates loading or progress in a circular form

thickness.description: Controls the stroke width of the circle

allOf.description: Indicates loading or progress in a linear bar

valueBuffer.description: Secondary buffer value for buffered progress mode

allOf.description: Generic layout container with system styling support

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

allOf.description: Centers and constrains content horizontally

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

disableGutters.description: If true, disables the left and right padding

fixed.description: Sets a fixed max width instead of a fluid one

maxWidth.description: Defines the maximum width of the container

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

allOf.description: A preset dialog layout with title, content, and action buttons
Layouts children in a one-dimensional stack

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles

direction.description: Defines whether items are stacked in a row or column

flexWrap.description: Controls whether items wrap onto multiple lines

useFlexGap.description: Uses CSS gap instead of margins for spacing

allOf.description: Surface component for grouping related content

useHeaderAction.description: Enables an action area inside the header

useHeaderAvatar.description: Displays an avatar inside the header

useSubheader.description: Displays a subheader below the main header

useMedia.description: Enables a media section inside the card

useActions.description: Displays an actions section at the bottom

useCardActionArea.description: Wraps content with a clickable action area

header.description: Content rendered in the card header

headerAction.description: Action element displayed in the header

headerAvatar.description: Avatar element displayed in the header

subHeader.description: Secondary text displayed below the header

media.description: Media content such as an image or video

actions.description: Action buttons or controls for the card

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

allOf.description: Shows the current page location within a hierarchy

separator.description: Element used to separate breadcrumb items

maxItems.description: Specifies the maximum number of breadcrumbs to display

itemsAfterCollapse.description: If max items is exceeded, the number of items to show after the ellipsis

itemsBeforeCollapse.description: If max items is exceeded, the number of items to show before the ellipsis

allOf.description: Clickable element for navigation or actions

noWrap.description: If true, the text will not wrap, but instead will truncate with a text overflow ellipsis

gutterBottom.description: If true, the text will have a bottom margin

allOf.description: Associates a label with a form control

checked.description: If true, the component is checked

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

labelPlacement.description: Position of the label relative to the control

allOf.description: Label for grouping or describing form fields

disabled.description: If true, the component is disabled

error.description: If true, the component is displayed in an error state

required.description: If true, the input element is required

allOf.description: Component for uploading one or more files

style.description: The component styles for the `style` attribute.

wrapperStyle.description: The component wrapper styles for the `style` attribute.

propertyNames.description: The type for the event name.

htmlAttributes.description: The set of arbitrary HTML attributes added to the component.

slot.description: The name of the occupied component property in the parent component.

renderWhen.description: The expression or function to conditionally render a component.

disableDataBinding.description: Disables data binding for the component.

AbstractComponentStore.description: Component settings for serialization in JSON.
